body: These steel pauldrons are engraved with images of charging bulls. When their wearer makes a bull rush combat maneuver, she can make the check twice and take the better result. Furthermore, they grant a +2 enhancement bonus to CMD against bull rushes.
name: Pauldrons of the Bull
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Shoulders/Shoulders Slot Wondrous Items/Pauldrons of the Bull
